about_the_game:
This is the free version of Halloween 1985. Are you ready to relive the nostalgia of classic arcade games? Halloween 1985 transports you to the essence of mid-80s platform games, where the action is fast, reflexes are key and adventures are unforgettable.

On Halloween night 1985, the Halloween monsters decide to steal all the pumpkins from Pumpkman's store, our protagonist. Take control of Pumpkman and help him recover all his pumpkins through five dreamlike, original and hilarious scenarios. Face the monsters in their lairs, recover all the stolen pumpkins and get ready for the final challenge: teach the big Halloween boss a lesson.

Main features in this demo:

  • A classic arcade adventure: This game will transport you to the magical arcades of the 80s!

  • Enjoy the Witch level completely free of charge in this demo and complete it 100% with all the extra objectives.

  • Classic platform gameplay.

  • Retro pixel graphics.

  • Chiptune soundtrack.

  • Arcade challenges "no continues".

In the full version you will find:

  • 3 game modes: Beginner Mode, Expert Mode and Speedrun Mode.

  • 5 iconic levels + 1 final boss level: Dracula, the werewolf, the mummy, the witch, the evil clown and the devil as the final boss.

  • Extra objectives for each level: Collect the pumpkins in order and banish the monster for lots of extra points.

  • A bonus level: go completely crazy collecting pumpkins in a limited time. Will you succeed?

Halloween 1985 is here, Pumpkman needs you to get his pumpkins back and defeat these creepy monsters that want to ruin his day! Are you ready to take on the challenge?

  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: Join the Halloween 1985 action and test your skills in this classic arcade platformer! Beat all the levels, completing all the objectives, to get the best score, and save your name into the High Score; just like old times!
